mapper.select: SELECT map_color FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT c.id, c.name, c.continent, cv.user_id IS NOT NULL AS visitStatus, cw.user_id IS NOT NULL AS wishStatus, cf.user_id IS NOT NULL as favStatus FROM country c LEFT JOIN country_visit cv ON c.id = cv.country_id AND cv.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN country_wish cw ON c.id = cw.country_id AND cw.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN country_fav cf ON c.id = cf.country_id AND cf.user_id = #{userId}
name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
SELECT id, country_id FROM country_visit WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT c.continent, COUNT(*) AS visitedCount FROM country_visit cv JOIN country c ON c.id = cv.country_id WHERE cv.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY c.continent
SELECT continent, COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM country GROUP BY continent
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO country_visit (user_id, country_id, start_date, end_date) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{countryId}, COALESCE(#{startDate}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), COALESCE(#{endDate}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) )
mapper.select: SELECT fp.id, fp.country_id, fp.city_id, fp.title, fp.created_at, fi.photo_url AS thumbnail FROM feed_post fp LEFT JOIN feed_image fi ON fi.feed_id = fp.id WHERE fp.country_id = #{countryId} AND fp.user_id = #{userId} AND fp.blind_status = "VISIBLE"
